verses.roman:
yadyapi āmāra sparśa koṭīndu-śītala
rādhikāra sparśe āmā kare suśītala

synonyms: yadyapi—although; āmāra—My; sparśa—touch; koṭi-indu—like millions upon millions of moons; śītala—cool; rādhikāra—of Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī; sparśe—the touch; āmā—Me; kare—makes; su-śītala—very, very cool.
translation: "And although My touch is cooler than ten million moons, I am refreshed by the touch of Śrīmatī Rādhikā.
